binToNumDialog.goalDesc: Convert binary code on the left screen to number displayed on the right screen.
binToNumDialog.howToUseDesc:
Use the right screen to directly edit the number on it.
 Press the green validation button to confirm your answer.

numToBinDialog.goalDesc: Convert the number on the left screen to binary code displayed on the right screen.
numToBinDialog.howToUseDesc:
Use the blue buttons to create different binary combinations.
 Press the green validation button to confirm your answer.

welcomeDialog.intro: Whether you're a coding enthusiast or just exploring the world of binary, you're in the right place!
welcomeDialog.binaryToNumber: Convert binary code to their equivalent number.
welcomeDialog.numberToBinary: Switch it up and convert numbers to binary code.
welcomeDialog.instruction: Use the simple and intuitive interfaces to make your conversions with ease.
welcomeDialog.popup: Do not show this popup again
